channel.title: Command Line on Coding notes - and snippets
channel.description: Recent content in Command Line on Coding notes - and snippets

item.title: Create Files from Command Line in Windows
item.description: Create a file with content: echo "whatever content" > filename.txt Works in any Windows console (CMD, PowerShell, Git Bash).

item.title: Change directory to different drive in Windows cmd
item.description: To switch drives in Windows cmd, use the drive letter followed by a colon. cd won’t work across drives. C:\Users\bustroker> d: D:\>

item.title: Context Menu Terminal for Windows
item.description: Goal: Set up a portable terminal with context menu integration for quick folder access. Install Cmder Download cmder, unzip to a non-protected folder (avoid Program Files or system directories). Add Context Menu Integration Open cmd as Administrator: cd c:\cmder\folder .\cmder.exe /REGISTER ALL Right-click any folder to get “Open Cmder here” option.
